npc_output: I'm a sailor, nice to meet you!
Actually, could you help me with |r2|?
Hi there, beautiful day isn't it?
Just a bit excited, don't mind me!
Sure, I love talking about farming!
It's going great, thanks for asking! |r1| soon!
I love all kinds of music, especially when played on the lyre!
No thanks, I'm good. Just enjoying the sunny day!
Not much, just got back from a long delivery. |r1| was a success!
